summary: Adds a strong (Ridiculous Potion Chest) box to QASmoke with 400 of each "Uber" Blacksmith/Enchanting elixirs that boost said skills by 1000%
descriptionHtml:
Do you like making one-shot kills on dragons? Are you tired of using the Fortify Restoration potion exploit to give your gear "God Like" stats? Or gathering ingredients for said potions? Well Look No Further...

For through the magic of the Creation Kit, too much caffeine, not enough sleep, and extreme boredom, I've added 400 of each Uber Blacksmith/Enchanting Elixirs to to a Strong Box in QASmoke
that improve weapon upgrades and the strength of enchantments by 1000%

Now if you're not one to use such items, like looking around for ingredients, spending your hard earned Septims on substandard potions, or are just a plain glutton for punishment... Please click your browsers back button, and forget you ever saw this
author: jynx474
